divs: sighting detailswe were walking our dog east and we noticed 6 red lights in north east direction above the foot hills of north lake forest ca. the objections we in creating a pattern\line formation, then they shifted closer together. they were higher 1000 ft. then a helicopter was flying towards them and they pulsated and 2 disapeared. then the other 4 changed direction and pulsated and then vanished. then the helicopter turned around and took off back towards the south west.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: 6 red large lights hovering in pattern
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lake Forest
There were no other sightings in Lake Forest on or around February 16th 2013
